title: Noam Finkelstein
text:
Welcome to my website!
I’ve spent the past decade working as a research scientist and engineer, primarily with clinical and biological data. Most recently, I was a researcher in a cancer biology lab, and then the head of machine learning at a maternal health company. I currently work on machine learning for cancer care at Flatiron Health.
I hold a PhD in Computer Science and an ScM in Biostatistics from the Johns Hopkins University, a Bachelor’s degree in Politics, Philosophy and Economics from the University of Oxford, and an Associate’s degree from Deep Springs College.
Please feel free to get in touch.
